desc: This course, designed for students who want to heighten their drawing skills, emphasizes using expressive qualities of drawing by investigating various media, techniques, and content. Assignments are both traditional and nontraditional within historical and contemporary perspectives. Experimentation is encouraged. Students are encouraged to develop a personal visual language. The course culminates in the production of a series of drawings that relate thematically. Critical thinking and discussion skills are important. Prerequisite: Art 102. Materials fee. Offered annually.
name: Advanced Drawing
notes: Open to all students who meet the prerequisite.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Art 102. Materials fee. Offered annually.
